# Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
## Title
Outdoor Firing Range Facility for Firearms Training of Border Services Officers
## Reference Number
1000415357
## Solicitation Number
PW-22-01017972 (Amendment 1)
## Closing Date and Time
December 20, 2022 is the announcement date, while the tender will expire on January 12, 2023 at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
## Contractor Information
- **Contracting Entity Name**: Canada Border Services Agency
- **Address**: 333 North River Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1L 8B9, Canada
- **Contact Person**: Lynn Kalp, lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
## Tender Description
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) has a requirement to rent an outdoor firing range facility for Border Services Officers’ firearms training. The provider must offer a firearms range facility for approximately 115 days per year in the Regional Municipality of Niagara. The standard policies include firearms training and security requirements.

## Definition of the Requirement
The CBSA is seeking for a competitive offer to rent an outdoor firing range facility for firearms training of Border Services Officers. The contract period is from April 19, 2023 to April 18, 2025, with the option to extend the contract by four (4) additional one-year periods.

## Submission Information
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified to provide the services described in this ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date and time of this notice.
